sentence.Network_en: Arrived in Xian, they made their way to Yanan.
sentence.Network_cn: 到达西安后, 他们就动身前往延安.

sentence.Network_en: The realistic spirit is and the key content of Yanan style.
sentence.Network_cn: 延安作风是中国共产党在延安时期求真务实的产物.

sentence.Network_en: We visited Yanan, sacred place of the revolution, last Sunday.
sentence.Network_cn: 上星期天我们访问了革命圣地延安.
